MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 09-APR-2021 01:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the G72 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Stoneymeadow road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.15pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations and repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:10PM on Thursday 08 April 2021.
